name: Save The Web
description:
After a devastating virus destroyed the internet, the last remaining server and his friends need to rebuild the Internet! Defend your expanding network against nasty wire-munching bugs using power surges and firewalls. Remember to keep repairing your network or you'll stop generating Bits!
